title: Seeing opportunities in India, he quit Google in Silicon Valley
title_page: Seeing opportunities in India, he quit Google in Silicon Valley | The Straits Times
maintext:
KOLKATA - Mr Saumil Tripathi’s favourite movie is Swades, a 2004 Bollywood film that tells the story of an Indian engineer with the United States National Aeronautics and Space Administration, his return to India, and how he helps introduce electricity to a village.
It is a film he has watched nearly 15 times.
